name: Byte Sized
description: Byte Sized is an ongoing YouTube series where we create bite-sized applications to demonstrate some of the more interesting concepts in the field of programming.

name: Slime Farm
description: Slime Farm is an evolution simulator. Completed as a university individual course of study, this application is an intuitive and user-friendly approach to genetic algorithms.

name: Student's Toolshed
description: Created using ruby-on-rails, Student's Toolshed is a collection of self-contained javascript applications. The apps themselves are small, useful tools targeted for use by university students.

name: Course Scheduler
description: Course Scheduler is an application that generates all possible schedules given the timeslots for each course. It may look and feel like legacy software, but it gets the job done.

name: Study Pres Generator
description: Study Pres Generator is a simple command-line ruby application for creating flashcard study presentations. It takes a JSON file of questions and answers as input and uses LaTeX to create the presentation.

name: Migration Runner
description: Migration Runner is a Go library for managing and running database migrations. It is maintained by a continuous integration pipeline and boasts 100% test coverage.
